# portkey_mcp_integrations (Data Source)

Fetches all Portkey MCP integrations, optionally filtered by workspace.

## Example Usage

### List All MCP Integrations

```terraform
data "portkey_mcp_integrations" "all" {}

output "mcp_integration_count" {
  value = length(data.portkey_mcp_integrations.all.integrations)
}
```

### Filter by Workspace

```terraform
data "portkey_mcp_integrations" "dev" {
  workspace_id = portkey_workspace.dev.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `workspace_id` (String) Filter integrations by workspace ID.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Identifier for this data source.
- `integrations` (Attributes List) List of MCP integrations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--integrations))

<a id="nestedatt--integrations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `integrations`

Read-Only:

- `auth_type` (String) Authentication type.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the integration was created.
- `description` (String) Integration description.
- `id` (String) Integration UUID.
- `last_updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `name` (String) Integration name.
- `slug` (String) URL-friendly identifier.
- `status` (String) Status.
- `transport` (String) Transport protocol.
- `url` (String) MCP server URL.
- `workspace_id` (String) Workspace ID.
